titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at White-Hall on Sunday, September 8, 1695 being the day of thanksgiving for the taking of Namur, and the safety of His Majesty's person / by J. Adams ...
titleStmt.author: Adams, John, 1662-1720.

notesStmt.note: "Published by order of the Lords Justices"
